Description: Rarely available, this two bed 1 bath stunning apartment will take your breath away! Located in the cuvetted Sumner Hill this unit has a renovated chef's kitchen with top of the line appliances, sub zero fridge, Wolfe stove. Gleaming hardwood floors and ceiling plans throughout. Modern bathroom with new Jacuzzi with French bathtub. Laundry in unit, private porch and MUCH MORE! Available 9/1 with flexible move in dates until 10/1. Piano is staying at the property. 1 Parking included
